channel.title: Comments for page "This Hand of Mine"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "This Hand of Mine"

item.title: Years later...
item.content:encoded: This is covered on Chunks' page, but for those looking here, ALEA IACTA EST. You use THoM, you live with the bingo. Chunks keeps other people from smacking you, if you hit yourself, that's not his problem.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Chunks has the ability to "make you immune to THoM". Does that mean it just can't be used against you, so you wouldn't take the 100 damage, or can it also be used to save yourself from the self-bingo? I'm guessing not, that would be a rather large loophole, but I wanted to make sure, especially since the self-bingo just went up to 2 days o_O

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So how long does this bingo you for when you use it?

item.title: Correction
item.content:encoded:
The quote is actually "It's loud roar tells me to *grasp* victory!" (just sounds better). Not sure how you guys feel about off sitesâ€¦ but here is proof if neccessary: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cwyVV5_orBo&feature=related

And yes, it sounds like such a nerdy thing to complain about so I decided to remain anonymous lolz.
